metadata.title: “Our infographic content is 1155% more likely to become evergreen”: How the South China Morning Post leverages infographics | What’s New in Publishing | Digital Publishing News
metadata.description: Founded in 1903 and headquartered in Hong Kong, the South China Morning Post is one of Asia’s most respected news organizations. It is also one of the most progressive with a strong emphasis on audience engagement across multi-channels – SCMP’s UGC YouTube channel reached a staggering 1 billion vie…
metadata.author: WNIP

metadata.title: Instagram Reels: What news publishers think about platform’s shift to video
metadata.description: What news publishers need to know about Instagram Reels and platform’s shift to video featuring insight from ITV News, Reach and The New Statesman.
metadata.author: Twitter
